root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 9-5-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability:

Data available for over 130 countries for R&D expenditure as % of GDP

Time series:

Data available in the UIS database since reference year 1996, but historical data available back to 1981

Disaggregation:

R&D expenditure can be broken down by sector of performance, source of funds, field of science, type of research and type of cost.
